entry.title: Milk Chocolate Cashew Caramel
entry.s:vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
Type:
Price: 12.99 - 15.99 (2 variants)

three main types
of chocolate

here are three main types of chocolate — white chocolate, milk chocolate, and dark chocolate. Everyone has their favorite, go-to flavor. But, how much do you actually know about the different kinds of chocolate? Do you know what differentiates semisweet from bittersweet? Or why white chocolate is softer than milk chocolate? It all comes down to how the chocolate is made and what ingredients are used to make it. Read on to learn about the varying flavors, compositions, and characteristics of each kind of chocolate.

Milk Chocolate
Cashew Caramel

Milk chocolate is a classic that we all know and love from childhood. With its light brown color, creamy texture, and sweet flavor, milk chocolate is widely regarded as the most popular type of chocolate. It is made by combining chocolate liquor (cocoa solids and cocoa butter) with sugar, and milk. Sometimes an emulsifier, such as soy lecithin, is added to enhance its smoothness. According to the FDA definition, milk chocolate must contain at least 10% chocolate liquor and 12% milk.

entry.title: Peppermint
entry.s:vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
Type:
Price: 5.99 - 7.99 (2 variants)

Our Chokolade Peppermint Mini has a cool peppermint creme filling, carefully made from organic ingredients and covered in tempting dark chocolate for a refreshing treat. We’d also like to note that while our peppermint is extremely cool, there’s nothing happening, hip or groovy about genetically modified organisms, and that’s precisely why you won’t find them in our peppermint, chocolate or any of the other ingredients in these bars. We believe the way to be truly cool is to be natural, and that’s how we’ve done it from the start.

entry.title: Peanut Butter & Jelly
entry.s:vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
Type:
Price: 7.99 - 9.99 (2 variants)

We are proud to announce our newest addition to the Chokolade product family – our very own PB&J bar! Let’s face it, it’s nice to dress up once in a while, and peanut butter looks mighty scrumptious with a ruby layer on top. Our batch peanut butter is paired here with raspberry filling, a traditional pairing that will drive straight for your heart. Order a caddy of 18 for a 10% discount… What’s even better? Neither our peanut butter nor our jelly (and certainly not our chocolate) is made with genetically modified organisms (so, they’re non-GMO) of any type, so you while our PB&J bars may transport you back to your childhood, they’re likely eons healthier than the stuff you remember eating as a kid. Don’t worry though, that doesn’t mean we compromised on taste. Just take a peek at the reviews below to see what people think about our particular take on PB&J.

entry.title: Peanut Butter
entry.s:vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
Type:
Price: 4.99 - 6.99 (2 variants)

Our smooth & crunchy peanut butter center is covered in creamy organic milk chocolate. At Chokolade, we make our own small-batch peanut butter fillings from fresh organic peanuts, cane sugar and sea salt, for a true delight. Price discounted by 10% for all 18ct caddy orders! Did you also know that peanuts are naturally gluten-free? And we didn’t monkey with the basics when we covered our peanut butter in our smoothest organic milk chocolate, which is why we’re certified gluten-free by the Gluten Free Food Program USA.

entry.title: Dark Peanut Butter
entry.s:vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chokolade | Chocolate Sweets & Candy And Cake Shopify Theme
Type:
Price: 6.99 - 9.99 (2 variants)

Our Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter bar is made with organic and dairy free ingredients in small batches. Vegan or not, this bar will be sure to satisfy both palates, with a rich and chunky peanut butter center covered in bold, dark chocolate. Price discounted by 10% for all 18ct caddy orders! Here’s the thing though, taking our classic peanut butter candy bar and wrapping it in dark chocolate didn’t only allow us to make it vegan, these bars are also gluten-free (and certified as such by the Gluten Free Food Program USA) as well as absolutely free of genetically modified organisms (so, they’re non-GMO.) So don’t be afraid to hashtag #awesome, hashtag #healthy the next time you get a craving for something sweet, just reach for your dark peanut butter OCHO candy bar!
